title: RITO WHY YOU NO LET ME BUY NEW SKIN
body: I skipped class to buy rp so I could get the first Yorick skin in 6 years and I boot up league to find the skin in the rotation but not in store please explain yourselves.

replies.body: New content like skins on patch notes aim to release during the patch, but not necessarily the same day.  Keep your eyes on the store page or [Sales](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales) site for more news!
